<Link id="l03069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3069"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3070"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we have alloca, convert as follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3071"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ADJCALLSTACKDOWN -&gt; sub, sp, sp, amount</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3072"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ADJCALLSTACKUP   -&gt; add, sp, sp, amount</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3073"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Amount = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>.getFrameSize(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3074"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Amount != 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3075"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to keep the stack aligned properly.  To do this, we round the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3078"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Amount = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetframelowering/#ac54cd9ae6b849b3a2fd1fe982f9d09e2">alignSPAdjust</a>(Amount);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3126"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The stack limit in the TCB is set to this many bytes above the actual</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stack limit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3129" lineLink="#ad6f5455eb7ba6ed74cab551099d0a952"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="#ad6f5455eb7ba6ed74cab551099d0a952">kSplitStackAvailable</a> = 256;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3130"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Adjust the function prologue to enable split stacks. This currently only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// supports android and linux.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The ABI of the segmented stack prologue is a little arbitrarily chosen, but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// must be well defined in order to allow for consistent implementations of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#95;&#95;morestack helper function. The ABI is also not a normal ABI in that it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// doesn&#39;t follow the normal calling conventions because this allows the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// prologue of each function to be optimized further.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Currently, the ABI looks like (when calling &#95;&#95;morestack)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#42; r4 holds the minimum stack size requested for this function call</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#42; r5 holds the stack size of the arguments to the function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#42; the beginning of the function is 3 instructions after the call to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#95;&#95;morestack</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Implementations of &#95;&#95;morestack should use r4 to allocate a new stack, r5 to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// place the arguments on to the new stack, and the 3-instruction knowledge to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// jump directly to the body of the function when working on the new stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An old (and possibly no longer compatible) implementation of &#95;&#95;morestack for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ARM can be found at &#91;1&#93;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#91;1&#93; - https://github.com/mozilla/rust/blob/86efd9/src/rt/arch/arm/morestack.S</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3155" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armframelowering/#a62042f5fd3a2df1b4fab2bfc692b2390"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armframelowering/#a62042f5fd3a2df1b4fab2bfc692b2390">ARMFrameLowering::adjustForSegmentedStacks</a>(</span></CodeLine>
